author: Lucas Nolan
title: Mark Zuckerberg Commits $25 Million to Chinese Virus Research Fund
description: The philanthropic arm of Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg's empire, the Chan Zuckerberg Initiative, has reportedly committed to $25 million to a research fund that aims to identify and develop treatments for the Wuhan coronavirus.
content:
The philanthropic arm of Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s empire, the Chan Zuckerberg Initiative, has reportedly committed to $25 million to a research fund that aims to identify and develop treatments for the Wuhan coronavirus.
